channel.title: [PI] XP Rates
channel.description:
Hey guys, I tryed to Bump my XP rates up a little higher but no matter what i try to do the xp stays the same :S Does anyone have any idea how to properly do it? i just went into config.java and changed the multiplyers, the fishing seems to be a bit screwed also every lobster u catch you only get 700 xp :S
Source: Hybrid PVP V3 And i have no compiling errors
EDIT: Never mind fixed it the config xp multipliers weren't coded into the skills :P :)
